name: Return 0;
description:
It´s an infinite action game with level progression and top down camera where we play as a clone, product from an evil lab that is testing clones combat ability for an army. You are stuck in the experiment, you will never leave. Whether you show your combat abilities or not, you can´t escape from your destiny.

Bug fixes after release: 

-Animation bug where enemies rotate towards the player

-Scientist not playing animations

-transition between screens not working properly

Made By:
